CustomField.description: Indicates whether Primary Loss Reason and Loss Reason Detail are entered or not. Part of Sales QA process.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( MRR__c<0, OR( Loss_Reason_Entered__c = FALSE, ISBLANK(TEXT(Primary_Loss_Reason__c)))), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: Please select Primary Loss Reason and enter Loss Reason Detail.
CustomField.label: Check - Loss Reason
